title: LF Gold 5+ ADC Main
body: Im a g5 supp main, will be playing 3 main champs (karma, janna, soraka). I can play others but those are the 3 mains. Looking for someone who is a good Kog, lucian, ezreal, ect... also must have a mic and ts/skype. add me ign if your interested Nugget Ninja

replies.body: :3 i play adc but my mains are sivir, tris, corki and i play abit of ez i prefer tanky support but can adjust 2 ur playstyle add me if u want 2 play a few games Renold12345
